entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this morning. A few showers beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. High 9. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 21. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
